Activity: Arrive at work, grab a cup of coffee, and listen to some ambient music to ease into the day.
Check work email and prioritize tasks based on urgency.
Begin implementing the help desk portal. Focus on creating a user-friendly dashboard with ticket tracking and a knowledge base.
Take a short break to stretch and daydream about future travel destinations.

Work on the knowledge base feature of the portal. Research and gather information on common IT issues encountered by hospital staff to create helpful articles and tutorials. @HIS-1 @HIS-2 Topic: Help Desk Knowledge Database
Lunch break. Read a book or write in a journal.
Continue building out the help desk portal, adding features such as FAQs and a contact form.
Test the email channel for submitting tickets, ensuring that all fields are correctly populated and the ticket is properly routed to the appropriate support team.
Make the system more intuitive and user-friendly, considering the diverse technical skills of the hospital staff. @Trainer-1 Topic: System introduction training for medical staff.
Review the day's progress and make a plan for tomorrow.
Clock out and head home, feeling satisfied with the work completed.
